ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Question on getting into Dragon raids
ygData.msgSnippet: Full?  Whats that?  I saw post from Dragons last week where they took 11 groups to a Vox raid.  hehe, too funny.  I guess that s good for those that want to go
ygData.messageBody:
Full? Whats that? I saw post from Dragons last week where they took 11
groups to a Vox raid. hehe, too funny. I guess that's good for those that
want to go everyone gets to go but 11 is just insane.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Egelhof, Tobias [mailto:tobias.egelhof@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2001 7:47 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: AW: [eqbards] Question on getting into Dragon raids


same on tholuxe paells. dragons are booked weeks ahead and die shortly after
servers coming up. normally you can sign for open/invite dragon raids (which
they usually are) one or two weeks before the raid.
when raids are actually running you normally have no chance of joining since
groups are full most of the time.

tobi

-----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
Von: Jamie R. Bedford [mailto:bbedford@...]
Gesendet am: Mittwoch, 25. Juli 2001 07:01
An: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Betreff: Re: [eqbards] Question on getting into Dragon raids

I don't know about Xegony, but on Tunare generally the dragons die within 12
hours of the servers coming up. That, and we use a reservation type system
(based on EzBoard) where leaders will sign up for entire weeks such that
they can lead given a patch day or a regular respawn and anyone interested
in joining the raid can contact them well ahead of time. Oh, the dragons
are booked months ahead of time on Tunare, too, just as something to
possibly look forward to dependent on your server.
----- Original Message -----
From: John Grady
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, July 24, 2001 9:42 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Question on getting into Dragon raids


Just starting the epic quest at 52nd and hoping to get into one or two
more Naggy/Vox dragon raids on Xegony before I hit 53rd. So I wanted try
this idea out on everyone.

On my second account would it make sense to create two first level rogues?
One Barb to sneak and park in EF/Perm and one DE to sneak and park in
Lava/Sol B?

While I'm playing Tzeetch, I'm thinking I could check for late night raids
on the second account. (My usual playing time is 10pm ~ 2am PDT.) Sounds
simple, but since I haven't heard of anyone discuss I'm wondering if I'm
missing something.

Btw, any fellow Xegony Bards know of any Friday raids going on for these
two? I have the day off from family and work this Friday :-).

Tzeetch Spellsinger, Minstrel of 52 songs
The Commune, Xegony
